mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderdto(orderNum, userId, orderDate, postAddress, detailAddress, detailAddress2, recipient, recipientPhone) VALUES (#{orderNum}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{postAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{detailAdderess2}, #{recipient}, #{recipientPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT orderNum, o.userId, orderDate, postAddress, detailAddress, detailAddress2, recipient, recipientPhone, p.productName, p.productPrice, c.productCnt, p.pno FROM orderdto as o INNER JOIN cartdto as c ON o.userId = c.userId JOIN productdto as p ON c.pno = p.pno WHERE o.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY orderNum;
